hero.heading: Find your balance with Nine Pilates
hero.subheading: Join us in transforming your body and mind through our expert-led classes and supportive community.

statement.text: Discover the transformative power of Pilates. Whether you’re just starting out or you’re a seasoned practitioner, discover your path to a strong body and a serene mind.

classes.heading: Pilates for every body and every mind
classes.subheading: Join us in transforming your body and mind through our comprehensive group and specialized programs.

philosophy.title: Discover the “Nine” Philosophy
philosophy.description: Nine principles. One philosophy. A path to move better, feel better, and live better.

principles.breathingDescription: Reconnect body and mind through conscious breath.
principles.concentrationDescription: Presence in motion - every movement begins with awareness.
principles.controlDescription: Master your body through intentional movement.
principles.centeringDescription: Find strength within - the core of every motion.
principles.precisionDescription: Refine each movement with focus, form, and purpose.
principles.balanceDescription: Cultivate stability and harmony in every movement.
principles.rhythmDescription: Embrace the natural rhythm of your body.
principles.wholenessDescription: Integrate mind, body, and spirit for holistic wellness.
principles.relaxationDescription: Let go of tension to move freely and live fully.

testimonials.title: Movement that leaves an
testimonials.description: Every journey begins with a single breath — these are the stories of progress, presence, and the quiet strength built through consistent practice.

client-1.name: Julie M
client-1.feedback: From the moment I walked into the studio, I felt supported. Every class feels intentional and empowering. Highly recommend Nine to anyone looking to strengthen both body and mind.

client-2.name: Alex R
client-2.feedback: Nine Pilates is truly a breath of fresh air. Every class feels so thoughtful and uplifting. It’s not just a workout,  it’s a complete mind-body reset.

client-3.name: Sarah L
client-3.feedback: From the very first class, I knew Nine Pilates was special. The instructors are attentive, the atmosphere is uplifting, and I always leave feeling stronger, calmer, and more connected to myself.

memberships.heading: Memberships made to move with you
memberships.description: Explore our membership options and find the perfect fit for your journey with us.

connect.heading: Connect & share with us on socials
connect.subheading: Join our mindful movement online - follow, tag, and share your journey with us.

contact.cta: Have a question? Shoot us a message!

storySection.aboutMe: I am Valerie, a passionate pilates instructor dedicated to helping others achieve their fitness goals through the power of movement and mindfulness.
storySection.myJourney: My journey into pilates began 4 years ago, and it has transformed my life in ways I never imagined. I am committed to sharing this transformative experience with others.
storySection.inspiration: My inspiration comes from the belief that pilates can empower individuals to connect with their bodies, improve their strength, and enhance their overall well-being. I strive to create a welcoming and inclusive environment for all.
storySection.mission: My mission with Nine Pilates is to provide high-quality Pilates instruction that caters to all levels, from beginners to advanced practitioners. I aim to inspire and motivate my clients to lead healthier, happier lives through the practice of pilates.

testimonial-1.name: Jane G
testimonial-1.testimonial: Valérie is truly an exceptional Pilates instructor. Her passion, energy, and patience create such a welcoming and empowering environment. She goes above and beyond to make sure everyone feels comfortable, offering thoughtful modifications and clear guidance throughout the class. You can tell she’s always well-prepared, and her attention to detail and client care—before, during, and after class—is unmatched. I’ve tried several instructors elsewhere, and Valérie truly stands out. Her classes are a highlight of my week.

testimonial-2.name: Malaika STL
testimonial-2.testimonial: Valérie is such an incredible Pilates instructor. Her explanations are always clear, her energy is contagious, and she has a natural ability to challenge and motivate in the most encouraging way. Every class feels fresh and engaging thanks to her creative flows and thoughtful sequencing.

testimonial-3.name: Sylvie M
testimonial-3.testimonial: Valerie is a truly amazing Pilates instructor. Her passion for Pilates and its core principles are inspiring. Her ability to connect with her students and her focus on correct movement and breathwork is not only engaging but also very motivating. Thanks to Valerie I have developed a deep appreciation for Pilates and commitment to my practice. Thank you, Val for being such an inspiration and for all your guidance. Looking forward to many more classes with you.

about.c2a: Join me on your wellness journey!

foundations.name: The Nine Foundations
foundations.description: A gentle, beginner-friendly introduction to the reformer, designed to set you up for success. You’ll work on alignment, breathwork, and control, building both confidence with the equipment and a solid understanding of the Nine Pilates principles.
foundations.advisory: First time on a reformer? We highly recommend starting here before moving on to more advanced classes.

form-flow.name: Form & Flow
form-flow.description: A full-body flow that blends strength, coordination, and control into rhythmic sequences designed to sculpt, energize, and inspire. Expect dynamic transitions, deep core engagement, and intentional movement that challenges your body from the inside out.
form-flow.advisory: Suitable for all levels, with options to modify or intensify as needed.

inferno.name: Inferno
inferno.description: A full-body flow that blends strength, coordination, and control into rhythmic sequences designed to sculpt, energize, and inspire. Expect dynamic transitions, deep core engagement, and intentional movement that challenges your body from the inside out.
inferno.advisory: Prior reformer experience is strongly recommended.

glute-mode.name: Glute Mode
glute-mode.description: A lower-body focused sculpt class targeting your glutes and core with precision and intensity. Expect deep glute activation, core stabilization, and strong sequencing that lifts, tones, and strengthens your posterior chain.
glute-mode.advisory: The tempo is controlled, the movements intentional — and the burn, undeniable. Prior reformer experience strongly recommended.

air-nine.name: Air Nine
air-nine.description: Elevate your heart rate and fire up your core in this high-energy, low-impact cardio class using the jumpboard. Expect explosive intervals, muscular endurance work, and full-body sequences that challenge your breath and stamina. Horizontal training at its best — targeting muscular endurance while boosting cardiovascular performance on the reformer. Bounce, sculpt, and sweat — all while protecting your joints.

restore.name: Restore & Stretch
restore.description: A slow, breath-driven reformer class focused on deep stretching, mobility, and nervous system reset. Move intentionally through lengthening sequences that release tension, restore alignment, and bring balance to the body and mind.
restore.advisory: Ideal for rest days, recovery, or as a complement to more intense sessions. Leave feeling grounded, open, and recharged.

flow.title: The Flow
flow.description: Build a steady routine and start seeing tangible results. Ideal if you’re aiming for 2 classes/week.
benefits: Noticeable gains in mobility and control
A sustainable rhythm that fits a busy schedule
Perfect for building a solid foundation while keeping balance with the rest of your life

rhythm.title: The Rhythm
rhythm.description: Make Pilates a pillar in your week with 3 classes/week—the sweet spot for clear adaptation and progression.
benefits: Momentum you can feel from week to week
If you want visible progress and a confident flow, this is your best balance of frequency and value.

fullCycle.title: The Full Cycle
fullCycle.description: Enjoy the full variety of classes — Foundations, Form & Flow, Inferno, Restore & Stretch — to balance intensity and recovery for complete results.
benefits: The freedom to train as often as you like
Smarter programming by cycling strength, cardio, and mobility
The best value if you’re consistent (~$22–$18/class when training 4–5×/week)
For those ready to live in their practice and feel the full Nine Pilates effect.
